references.paper_title: The challenges of modeling and forecasting the spread of covid-19
references.reason: This paper is cited as an example of time series forecasting in various fields, highlighting the importance of time series forecasting in addressing real-world problems.

references.paper_title: Some recent advances in forecasting and control
references.reason: This is a seminal work in time series analysis, which laid down the groundwork for ARIMA modeling and other traditional statistical methods.

references.paper_title: Gate-variants of gated recurrent unit (GRU) neural networks
references.reason: This paper introduces GRU, a fundamental recurrent neural network architecture used in many deep learning-based time series forecasting models, showcasing the importance of RNNs in this field.

references.paper_title: Fourier analysis and the sampling theorem
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the use of Fourier transforms in time series analysis, a key technique employed in the proposed FAN method.

references.paper_title: Tsmixer: Lightweight mlp-mixer model for multivariate time series forecasting
references.reason: This paper proposes a lightweight MLP-mixer model for multivariate time series forecasting, which is directly compared to the proposed FAN approach, highlighting the relevance of recent advances in this area.
